amendment.description: An amendment numbered 122 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit NOAA from using funds to relocate the Southeast Fisheries Science Center located in Virginia Key, Florida.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A115) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A115) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A115) offered by Mr. Gaetz.
